item.title: playerHandler.messageToAll problem
item.dc:creator: @Hey3 Hey*
item.description:
@Hey3 wrote:

If i do ::yell command, then it doesn’t work …

For example:
If i get 99 crafting, then it should tell to all that I just got 99 craft, but it doesn’t…

if (playerLevel[12] >= 99) { sendFrame164(6206); sendFrame246(6210, 290, 2714); sendFrame126("Congratulations, you have reached "+playerLevel[12]+" crafting!", 6207); sendFrame126("Talk to Hans in Lumbridge to recieve your skillcape!", 6208); sendMessage("Congratulations, you just received the highest possible level in this skill."); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " has just gotten " + playerLevel[12] + " Crafting!");

Help please?
Is there any way to rewrite it?
Some say sendMessage might also be sM, but can PlayerHandler.messageToAll be in dif form?

Read full topic
